website_summaries.verdict: Makes a long commute more relaxing thanks to a steady diffuser rate.
pros: Features two-in-one function as either a diffuser or a humidifier
Good diffuser pulse rate that disperses aroma throughout car cabin
Tank holds enough water to last eight hours
cons: Erratic operation when frequently used in vehicle

customer_reviews.title: Save your time & money!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked perfect the very first time I used it. It NEVER worked consistently afterwards. Loved the size, and loved the output when it worked, but had to return. I would’ve loved to have had it work properly for more than 1 day. Very disappointed in a product that I was so excited to receive.
customer_reviews.author: SpunkeyMama

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and simplistic design. I love this in my cubicle at work. Water tank is small enough to last a 8ish hour day and has two mist settings.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea at a Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Especially enjoy the versitality - can use in the house as well as the car. Only drawback is that it is very sensitive. Even the slightest over filling makes the unit inoperative. That is why I gave it a 4-star rather than a 5-star rating. Good thing is that it is easy enough to correct. Thought I had ruined it, but found that cleaning and thoroughly drying out returns it back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: dprint

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: After a week of use the red light started blinking and I could not get mist to work again. Tried cleaning and drying it out but no luck.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this little diffuser! I have it in my office at work, and it produces a very nice amount of mist. I love that it's a humidifier, too! Great product! I'm going to order another for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for long commute. It helps with anxiety over traffic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine!
customer_reviews.text: I thought mine was defected one, but I put above the max level that the vapor didn't come out. By the way, white looks better than black one for this product. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for car and office
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was fascinated with it and has it in her car. Very useful product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! The round ring stretched and broke the 2nd time we used it. Do not waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Humidifier/diffuser
customer_reviews.text: So fast it works great. I use it I in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! Works great in the car. Is easy to handle and doesn't spill if tipped.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat little diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat little diffuser. The only thing that would make it AMAZING... would be a rechargeable battery. It fits perfectly in my car's cup holder and does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and immediately you can see the work.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Japanese desktop humidifier that I adore and I started using it for my houseplants, so I needed another one for myself at the desk. I found this to be so easy to use compared to the one I have. I am using it with essential oil, so I pressed the on/off button twice to get the Blue light. Not sure how long this will last with water at max to start on diffuser mode. I will send one to my daughter for her dorm.
customer_reviews.author: Rosewater

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Diffuser for All Occassions!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this diffuser is small enough to be transported to just about anywhere! With its USB power source, it can easily be operated with the click of the power button. It pulses at a pretty good speed and allows the aroma of the oils to disperse at a nice rate. I love that I can use this diffuser in my car and not have to worry about spillage, due to its screw on top. I wish it cycled a bit longer to enjoy the scents a bit longer before refilling the water and oils. Other than that, this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Barker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just as described and looks great in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Nader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for office desk
customer_reviews.text: Better than those you see at TJ Maxx or Marshalls
customer_reviews.author: atomicaldwin

customer_reviews.title: Relieves Sinus Headache
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Within minutes of turning on, the moisture almost Instantly relieved my daughter's sinus headache. Well-made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: This is a humidifier not a diffuser....does not diffuse essential oils well
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for myself and one for my boyfriend who travels. These have a wick inside, and it seems to interfere with the oil being diffused into the air. I think this is more of a humidifier than a diffuser for essential oils. My boyfriend's quit working in less than a month. Mine still works, but doesn't diffuse the essential oils, just seems to put moisture into the air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out for me...
customer_reviews.text: Followed all directions, worked for about 3 minutes & stopped. Will pack it up & get ready for recycle bin.
customer_reviews.author: J. D

product_meta.title: Portable USB Car Humidifier, Travel Size Aroma Essence Oil Diffuser for Gifts,Mini BPA Free Vehicle-Mounted Air Purifier, Office Desk Plug-in Air Freshener
product_meta.description:
Notes：
1. Please make sure you’ve added water in the water tank before you use it. 
2. Please do not add water over the Max line marked inside; Less water, more mist actually! 
4. To avoid shortening its life span, please clean the water tank gently 2-3 times per week with paper towels or small soft brushes gently.
Specification:
Capacity: 110ml
Material: PP
Adapter: DC5V
Power: 5.5W
Product Size:3*3*6 in
Package Included: 
110ml Diffuser x1
USB Cable x1
User Manual x1
feature_bullets: Two-in-one: Red light for humidifier mode with mist volume of 30ml/hr; blue light for aromatherapy diffuser mode with mist volume of 18ml/hr

Compact and portable: With a shape of water bottle, it’s portable to carry; it’s can be driven by portable power, vehicle USB port or PC USB port, which makes it applicable for trip, work and physical exercise
Innovative: Different from the traditional diffuser with bottom air intake design, it adopts a top air intake with smoother mist outlet
Core part protection: With steel ball built in, it will prevent the core part being damaged from water and auto turn off the valve when it’s toppled carelessly
Whisper-quiet operation: With sound-free design, it only creates working noise lower than 30db(A), which hardly bothers you

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars7 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
